title: Dispatch Quay Crane to a Vessel
description: A vessel has berthed and is ready to begin cargo operations. A dispatcher must assign cranes to start discharging containers.

tasks.description: Confirm the vessel is 'all fast' (securely moored) and the gangway is down.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher receives confirmation from the mooring gang and vessel agent that operations can begin.

tasks.description: Based on the vessel size and required productivity, assign two available quay cranes (QCs) to the vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher assigns QC-02 and QC-03 to the 'MSC London'.

tasks.description: Send the first sequence of container moves from the stowage plan to the assigned crane operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: The first set of discharge instructions appears on the crane operators' cabin terminals.
